description: A tool to automate single-core GPU driver affinity benchmarking.
post_install: reg add "$hive\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\AppCompatFlags\Layers" /v "$dir\$_" /t REG_SZ /d "~ RUNASADMIN" /f | Out-Null
